title: Perm banned for nothing
body: Ive been playing lol since season 3. Have well over 150 skin and they just perm banned me for nothing. in my chat logs there isn't 1 curse word. What a good way to take someones money rip $800.

replies.body:
> Perm banned for nothing

You should know you behavior was not acceptable from the previous 5 punishments that led to your 6th and final. You were given plenty of chances to change your behavior.

> Additionally, you should know you behavior was not acceptable from the previous 5 punishments that led to your 6th and final. You were given plenty of chances to change your behavior.

{{summoner:11}}

1) "Inciting a report" is reportable and ban able offense
2) Unsportmanslike and negative behaviour
3) Spamming

Even if they report you at the same time, you would have had maybe 14 day ban or chat restrictions before a perman ban.

A perman ban would mean you have had been reported before to the point where a perman ban was needed.

having 150 skins does not make you immune to perman ban, you basically set yourself up to lose your 1150 skins, the money was theirs after you made the purchase, assuming you didn't have your 3 refund tokens.
anyway of them unbanning, at some point?
Perma-bans are permanent. The only exception to this is when a punishment was issued in error.

Them all reporting you doesn't make a difference, 9 people could report you but if you didn't do anything wrong nothing would have happened, the amount of reports doesn't affect anything. What does affect things however is that in order to get permabanned for toxicity you have to have been banned for it multiple times before.
Unless you're REALLY toxic in which case you can jump a few tiers.
I'm fairly certain you can't go from no punishment to permaban, especially since he posted his chat logs. It's not as if he's spamming hate speech, he's just being a dick.

Actually, in extreme cases, the punishment can escalate to a permanent ban without previous warning or punishment.


https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286#h1q2 
"PUNISHMENTS GENERALLY FOLLOW A BASIC ESCALATION PATH:
First Offense: 10 Game Chat Restriction
Second Offense: 25 Game Chat Restriction
Third Offense: Two Week Suspension
Fourth Offense: Permanent Suspension
However, it is possible to skip to a Two Week or Permanent suspension based on the severity of the behavior in the game. Excessive negative behavior can result in a Two-Week or Permanent suspension at any time without having a chat restriction on the account."
True but if the chat logs of his are real then I doubt they manually banned him, his toxicity wasn't really "severe" is all I meant.
